document_data.title: Consequences of Choice
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Consequences of Choice''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Avernus Rising|Avernus Rising]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Avernus]], and is an adventure designed for 11{{th}}- to 16{{th}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''The soul of the commander of the Bloody Hooves has been spirited away by Zariel’s lieutenant, General Everbleed. The Bloody Hooves are in disarray and will not be the fighting force Dara had hoped without the iron will of their commander to direct them. To find them amidst the battlefields of Avernus, you are going to need help. Hopefully you have made some friends in the Nine Hells…''|}}

Magic.Items: ''[[Oathbow]]'' • ''[[ring of warmth]]'' • ''[[soul coin]]'' • {{P|''[[Blade barrier|spell scroll of blade barrier]]''|13-14,35}} • {{P|''[[Investiture of wind|spell scroll of investiture of wind]]''|13-14,35}}

Index.Organizations:
:[[Bloody Hooves]] • [[Wandering Emporium]]
:;Player Factions:  [[Emerald Enclave]] • [[Harpers]] • [[Lords' Alliance]] • [[Order of the Gauntlet]] • [[Zhentarim]]
